name: A Dead Shooter
description:
[MOVE] WASD/Arrow
[SHOT]Left Mouth Button/Space

PLAY WITH FULLSCREEN

If you crash ,Let me know,I'll change maximum limit.

[Confirmed Platform]
Windows 10 Chrome/Edge/Firefox  is OK
Windows 7 Chrome is OK,Other's dont know

Mac OS X Mavericks 10.95 - Chrome is OK /Safari not working
I don't have other platform devices to confirm.

[Known Bugs]
Can't shoot Right-Upper Coner(there are Debug button)
